title: More effective logic is expected to process disk sorting when there is a border value for the row value
OB: When sorting on disk, if sorting on 40000 rows of data, and the program is set to process the data less than 40000, the program performs the following operations: 1.
SR: When sorting on disk, if sorting on 40000 rows of data, and the program is set to process the data less than 40000, the program should perform the following operations: 1. Save the file as a temporary file. 2. Load the data from the file into memory. 3. Sort the data. 4. Save the sorted data to the temporary file. 5.
